00191    * Destructor. 
00192    */
00193    template <class Interaction>
00194    AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::~AnglePotentialImpl() 
00195    {
00196       if (interactionPtr_) {
00197          delete interactionPtr_;
00198          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00199       }
00200    }

00209    /*
00210    * Read angle interaction parameters.
00211    */
00212    template <class Interaction>
00213    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00214    {
00215       readBegin(in,"AnglePotential");
00216       bool nextIndent = false;
00217       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00218       readEnd(in);
00219    }

00263    /*
00264    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00265    */
00266    template <class Interaction>
00267    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForces()
00268    {  
00269       Vector dr1; // R[1] - R[0]
00270       Vector dr2; // R[2] - R[1]
00271       Vector f1, f2;
00272       double rsq1, rsq2;
00273       GroupIterator<3> iter;
00274       Atom* atom0Ptr;
00275       Atom* atom1Ptr;
00276       Atom* atom2Ptr;
00277       int   type, isLocal0, isLocal1, isLocal2;
00278 
00279       storage().begin(iter);
00280       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00281          type = iter->typeId();
00282          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00283          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00284          atom2Ptr = iter->atomPtr(2);
00285          // Calculate minimimum image separations
00286          rsq1 = boundary().distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00287                                       atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00288          rsq2 = boundary().distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00289                                       atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00290          interaction().force(dr1, dr2, f1, f2, type);
00291          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00292          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00293          isLocal2 = !(atom2Ptr->isGhost());
00294          if (isLocal0) {
00295             atom0Ptr->force() += f1;
00296          }
00297          if (isLocal1) {
00298             atom1Ptr->force() -= f1;
00299             atom1Ptr->force() += f2;
00300          }
00301          if (isLocal2) {
00302             atom2Ptr->force() -= f2;
00303          }
00304       }
00305    }
00306 
00307    /*
00308    * Compute total angle energy on all processors.
00309    */
00310    template <class Interaction>
00311    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00312    void 
00313    AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00314    #else
00315    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00316    #endif
00317    {
00318 
00319       // Do nothing and return if energy is already set.
00320       if (isEnergySet()) return;
00321  
00322       Vector dr1; // R[1] - R[0]
00323       Vector dr2; // R[2] - R[1]
00324       double rsq1, rsq2, cosTheta;
00325       double angleEnergy;
00326       double localEnergy = 0.0;
00327       double fraction;
00328       double third = 1.0/3.0;
00329       GroupIterator<3> iter;
00330       Atom* atom0Ptr;
00331       Atom* atom1Ptr;
00332       Atom* atom2Ptr;
00333       int   type, isLocal0, isLocal1, isLocal2;
00334 
00335       storage().begin(iter);
00336       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00337          type = iter->typeId();
00338          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00339          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00340          atom2Ptr = iter->atomPtr(2);
00341          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00342          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00343          isLocal2 = !(atom2Ptr->isGhost());
00344          // Calculate minimimum image separations
00345          rsq1 = boundary().distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00346                                       atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00347          rsq2 = boundary().distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00348                                       atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00349          cosTheta = dr1.dot(dr2) / sqrt(rsq1 * rsq2);
00350          angleEnergy = interaction().energy(cosTheta, type);
00351          fraction = (isLocal0 + isLocal1 + isLocal2)*third;
00352          localEnergy += fraction*angleEnergy;
00353       }
00354 
00355       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00356       double totalEnergy = 0.0;
00357       communicator.Reduce(&localEnergy, &totalEnergy, 1, 
00358                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00359       if (communicator.Get_rank() != 0) {
00360          totalEnergy = 0.0;
00361       }
00362       setEnergy(totalEnergy);
00363       #else
00364       setEnergy(localEnergy);
00365       #endif
00366    }
00367 
00368    /*
00369    * Compute total pair stress (Call on all processors).
00370    */
00371    template <class Interaction>
00372    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00373    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00374    #else
00375    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress()
00376    #endif
00377    {
00378       // Do nothing and return if stress is already set.
00379       if (isStressSet()) return;
00380  
00381       Tensor localStress;
00382       Vector dr1, dr2;
00383       Vector f1, f2;
00384       double factor;
00385       double prefactor = -1.0/3.0;
00386       GroupIterator<3> iter;
00387       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00388       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00389       Atom*  atom2Ptr;
00390       int    type;
00391       int    isLocal0, isLocal1, isLocal2;
00392 
00393       localStress.zero();
00394       // Iterate over bonds
00395       storage().begin(iter);
00396       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00397          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00398          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00399          atom2Ptr = iter->atomPtr(2);
00400          type = iter->typeId();
00401          boundary().distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00402                                   atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00403          boundary().distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00404                                   atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00405 
00406          // f1 -- along dr1; f2 -- along dr2.
00407          interaction().force(dr1, dr2, f1, f2, type);
00408 
00409          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00410          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00411          isLocal2 = !(atom2Ptr->isGhost());
00412          factor = prefactor*(isLocal0 + isLocal1 + isLocal2);
00413          dr1 *= factor;
00414          dr2 *= factor;
00415          incrementPairStress(f1, dr1, localStress);
00416          incrementPairStress(f2, dr2, localStress);
00417       }
00418 
00419       // Normalize by volume 
00420       localStress /= boundary().volume();
00421 
00422       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00423       // Reduce results from all processors
00424       Tensor totalStress;
00425       int root = 0;
00426       communicator.Reduce(&localStress(0, 0), &totalStress(0, 0), 
00427                           Dimension*Dimension, MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, root);
00428       if (communicator.Get_rank() != root) {
00429          totalStress.zero();
00430       }
00431       setStress(totalStress);
00432       #else
00433       setStress(localStress);
00434       #endif
00435 
00436    }
00437 
00438    #if 0
00439    /*
00440    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00441    */
00442    template <class Interaction> double 
00443    AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForces(bool needForce, bool needEnergy)
00444    {
00445       // Preconditions
00446       //if (!storage().isInitialized()) {
00447       //   UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage must be initialized");
00448       //}
00449 
00450       Vector dr1; // R[1] - R[0]
00451       Vector dr2; // R[2] - R[1]
00452       Vector f1, f2;
00453       double rsq1, rsq2, cosTheta;
00454       double energy = 0.0;
00455       double angleEnergy;
00456       double fraction;
00457       double third = 1.0/3.0;
00458       GroupIterator<3> iter;
00459       Atom* atom0Ptr;
00460       Atom* atom1Ptr;
00461       Atom* atom2Ptr;
00462       int   type, isLocal0, isLocal1, isLocal2;
00463 
00464       storage().begin(iter);
00465       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00466          type = iter->typeId();
00467          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00468          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00469          atom2Ptr = iter->atomPtr(2);
00470          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00471          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00472          isLocal2 = !(atom2Ptr->isGhost());
00473          // Calculate minimimum image separations
00474          rsq1 = boundary().distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00475                                          atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00476          rsq2 = boundary().distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00477                                          atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00478          if (needEnergy) {
00479             cosTheta = dr1.dot(dr2) / sqrt(rsq1 * rsq2);
00480             angleEnergy = interaction().energy(cosTheta, type);
00481             fraction = (isLocal0 + isLocal1 + isLocal2)*third;
00482             energy += fraction*angleEnergy;
00483          }
00484          if (needForce) {
00485             interaction().force(dr1, dr2, f1, f2, type);
00486             if (isLocal0) {
00487                atom0Ptr->force() += f1;
00488             }
00489             if (isLocal1) {
00490                atom1Ptr->force() -= f1;
00491                atom1Ptr->force() += f2;
00492             }
00493             if (isLocal2) {
00494                atom2Ptr->force() -= f2;
00495             }
00496          }
00497       }
00498       return energy;
00499    }
